Task.Message: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Task.Name: GatherEntropy

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Message: An entropy source was registered. Source %1 Name %2 Type %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceNumber" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SourceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="SourceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceNumber" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="SourceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Message: Entropy source %1 provided %2 bytes with %3 millibits of entropy Data %5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceNumber" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BytesProvided" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EntropyEstimate" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Message: Callback to source %1 returned status %2, taking time %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="SourceNumber" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ResultStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="TimeTaken" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Message: Boot entropy result: Source %1 Policy %2 Code %3 Status %4 Time %5 BytesProvided %6 Bytes %8
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Policy" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ResultCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ResultStatus" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Time" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="BytesProvided" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PoolReseedCount" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ReseedType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>

Event.Task: Gather entropy for the system random number generator
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PoolNo" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PrngAddress" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PrngAddress" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="BytesProduced" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="nData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Data" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="nData"/> </template>
